00043 class ASO_Db
00044 {   
00045     /**
00046      * Creates the database adapter using the name passed.
00047      *    
00048      * @param string $adapter The name of the adapter to use.
00049      * @param array $config The configuration to pass to the adapter.
00050      * @return ASO_Db_Abstract
00051      */
00052     public static function factory( $adapter, $config = array() )
00053     {
00054         // Verify that adapter parameters are in an array.
00055         if( !is_array( $config ) )
00056             throw new ASO_Db_Exception('Adapter parameters must be in an array');
00057             
00058         // Verify that an adapter name has been specified.
00059         if( !is_string( $adapter ) || empty( $adapter ) )
00060             throw new ASO_Db_Exception( 'Adapter name must be specified in a string' );
00061             
00062         // Load the adapter class.
00063         require_once 'ASO/Db/'.$adapter.'.php';
00064 
00065         // Create an instance of the adapter, passing the config to it.
00066         $adapterName = 'ASO_Db_' . $adapter;
00067         return new $adapterName( $config );
00068     }
00069 
00070 }
